item.name: Home
item.description: In just a few days, it will be my one year “veganniversary.” Before you ask, YES, THERE WILL BE CHOCOLATE INVOLVED. But, I will be devoting a separate blog post on the veganniversary festivities and thought it might be nice to reflect upon what impact, if any, going plant-based has had on my life for the […]
